Articles.Content:
Really fancy name to use for sharing my (most probably) faulty crafts, but hey, why not?

Feel free to do whatever you like with these designs.

Please, let me know what you accomplished with them.

(And if somehow some of these really work out for you, tell others about their origin.)

PLACEHOLDER - WIP

The Orbiter

Simple craft for orbital practice and observation.

PLACEHOLDER - WIP

Mun Base

An oversized, 3 manned craft acting as a base.

PLACEHOLDER - WIP

Minmus 1

Modified desing capable of sending a Mun Base to Minmus for the same strictly scientific purpose.

PLACEHOLDER - WIP

Wanderlust

3 manned interpalentary craft, designed for flybys.

Edited September 18, 2012 by sal_vager

Ghery88, no, just no, you can add all that to the original post, and you should really have something here to show, not just "to be added later"

In fact, this is not a Spacecraft exchange thread at all, it is a test thread and it's pointless without content, sorry but I'm closing this.
